description: OffsetPaginationRequest is used to paginate the results

^(page_size)$.description: The maximum number of entries to return. If the value exceeds the maximum, then the maximum value will be used.

page.description: The (zero-based) offset of the first item returned in the collection.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of entries to return. If the value exceeds the maximum, then the maximum value will be used.

title: Offset Pagination Request
